name: ChaChaPoly.SealedBox
desc: A secure container for your data that you access using a cipher.

items.name: init<D>(combined: D)
items.desc: Creates a sealed box from the given data.

items.name: init<C, T>(nonce: ChaChaPoly.Nonce, ciphertext: C, tag: T)
items.desc: Creates a sealed box from the given tag, nonce, and ciphertext.

items.name: let combined: Data
items.desc: A combined element composed of the tag, the nonce, and the ciphertext.

items.name: var nonce: ChaChaPoly.Nonce
items.desc: The nonce used to encrypt the data.
